footer.title: BJJ Insight
footer.description: Personalized advice from your favorite athletes.

herobanner.title1: Progress with those who inspire you.

benefits.title: User Benefits
benefits.description: With BJJ Insight, you ask a specific question about your practice, technique, strategy, mental preparation or even recovery and you receive a clear, direct, and personalized answer from a confirmed athlete. No more searching through hours of generic videos: you save time, progress faster, and benefit from the experience of those who live at the highest level daily.

functionalities.title: Key Features
functionalities.feature1: Ask a question in 1 click, receive a personalized video response.
functionalities.feature2: Request technical, mental or strategic advice.
functionalities.feature3: Access athletes from around the world.

exampleAthlete.title: Become an Expert
exampleAthlete.subtitle: Stop giving free advice.
exampleAthlete.benefit1: Share your expertise with Jiu-Jitsu practitioners worldwide and grow your community.
exampleAthlete.benefit1Suffix: practitioners worldwide and grow your community.
exampleAthlete.benefit2: Monetize your time by offering 1-on-1 consultations and personalized training to your audience.
exampleAthlete.defaultQuote: Passionate Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu expert, I share my expertise and knowledge with the BJJI community to help every practitioner progress in their discipline.
exampleAthlete.fallbackQuote: BJJI allowed me to connect with a passionate Jiu-Jitsu community and share my expertise with practitioners from around the world.

callToAction.title: Download
callToAction.description: Start connecting with top-level athletes in just a few clicks.

home.title: BJJ Insight - Personalized Advice from Your Favorite Athletes
home.description: Connect with Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu experts and receive personalized advice. Ask questions and progress with the world's top athletes.
home.keywords: jiu-jitsu, bjj, martial arts, coaching, athletes, experts, technique, strategy, mental preparation
home.ogTitle: BJJ Insight - The Platform Connecting Enthusiasts to Experts
home.ogDescription: Join BJJ Insight and access advice from the world's best Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu athletes.

support.title: Support - BJJ Insight
support.description: Need help? Contact our BJJ Insight support team. We're here to answer all your questions.
support.keywords: support, help, contact, assistance, bjj insight, questions
support.ogTitle: BJJ Insight Support - We're Here to Help
support.ogDescription: Contact our support team for any questions about BJJ Insight.

onboardingBeta.title: Beta Access - BJJ Insight
onboardingBeta.description: Request access to BJJ Insight's closed beta and discover our BJJ coaching platform in preview.
onboardingBeta.keywords: beta, early access, bjj insight, test, preview, coaching
onboardingBeta.ogDescription: Be among the first to test BJJ Insight and access advice from top experts.
